name: The Maze Incident
description:
Everyone knows about the Backrooms. In this reality, 2 million people were mysteriously transported to the Backrooms in the early 2020's.  But that was 20 years ago. Now, there's a new mystery, new ways to exit The Maze. Will you get out of here alive, or is your exit, your death?

I added multiple endings to this game, more than two, so I encourage that you explore everything and try to talk to everyone. I've also put mazes inside of the maze, so REALLY REALLY explore EVERYTHING! 

I've lost all hope of trying to get the music to work. Does anyone know how to fix that?
